oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anthony Joyce Interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Joyce, Anthony; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Joyce, Anthony; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Anthony Joyce served in country during the Vietnam War from January 1965 through December 1966 as a platoon commander in the 1st Battalion 3rd Marine Division. Interview conducted by Ed Caudill.
